problem.title: CheckPoint: Newton's 2nd Law 1
problem.h3: Check Your Understanding of Newton's Second Law
problem.p: Suppose an object is initially at rest when it is suddenly acted on by two forces. A large force acts due north on the object and a smaller force acts due east. What is the direction of the object's acceleration?

choice.name: Foil1
choice.text: The object will accelerate due north.

choice.name: Foil2
choice.text: The object will accelerate due east.

choice.name: Foil3
choice.text: The object will accelerate north of east, but closer to north than east (> 45° N of E).

choice.name: Foil4
choice.text: The object will accelerate north of east, but closer to east than north (< 45° N of E).

choice.name: Foil5
choice.text: The object will accelerate exactly north-east (exactly 45° N of E).
